alert.note: Alert for Van Buren (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 23 at 1:23AM CST until December 23 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST SATURDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory including areas just south of Interstate 40, total snow accumulations up to one inch. * WHERE...Areas generally just to the south of I-40. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until noon CST Saturday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 AM CST early this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...While falling precipitation will end before sunrise Friday, travel impacts may last into the weekend.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
